greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{i|n, j|n, k|n} gcd(i,j,k).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: If p is prime, a(p) = 7 + p.
mathematica: a[n_] := DivisorSum[n, EulerPhi[n/#] * DivisorSigma[0, #]^3 &]; Array[a, 50] (* _Amiram Eldar_, May 10 2021 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = sumdiv(n, i, sumdiv(n, j, sumdiv(n, k, gcd([i, j, k]))));
(PARI) a(n) = sumdiv(n, i, sumdiv(n, j, sumdiv(n, k, n/lcm([i, j, k]))));
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, May 10 2021
